text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale and today

I'm going to roll this baby out and you

you keep working and you move fast
because if the pie crust starts to get
warm the butter starts to melt and then
the pie crust will start to fall apart
so working quickly is the most important
thing when it comes to pie crust and you
want to just keep moving it so it
doesn't stick in any particular place
and I'm going to roll this out until
